articles.title: 17-year-old stabbed inside Roxbury high school, no arrests, police say
articles.description:
Officers responded to Madison Park High School on Malcolm X Boulevard in Roxbury around noon Wednesday, the Boston Police Department said.

The post 17-year-old stabbed inside Roxbury high school, no arrests, police say appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A 17-year-old was stabbed at Madison Park High School in Roxbury on Wednesday.
Police responded to the incident around noon, but no arrests have been made.
The stabbing raises concerns about safety in Boston schools for students and parents.

articles.title: Report: Ex-Patriots QB Mac Jones is ‘in line’ to start for 49ers on Sunday
articles.description:
San Francisco starter Brock Purdy could be out "multiple weeks", 49ers coach Kyle Shanahan said.

The post Report: Ex-Patriots QB Mac Jones is ‘in line’ to start for 49ers on Sunday appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ex-Patriots QB Mac Jones is set to start for the 49ers on Sunday.
49ers starter Brock Purdy is expected to be out for multiple weeks.
Jones' performance could influence local fans' opinions on his time in Boston.
